object.name: setChatPhoto
object.description: Use this method to set a new profile photo for the chat. Photos can't be changed for private chats. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to set a new profile photo for the chat. Photos can't be changed for private chats. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to set a new profile photo for the chat. Photos can't be changed for private chats. The bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the appropriate administrator rights. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)

annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: New chat photo, uploaded using multipart/form-data
annotations.rst_description: New chat photo, uploaded using multipart/form-data
annotations.name: photo
